unnormalised: Varshik parinamam bhair aila, bhavano! Ani tumka sangta, hea natakak Bollywood blockbuster-achi spardha asa, raddho kortolea painkank, hushar topper-ank ani fuddlea varsak zatka tayari kortolea eka bhurgea sangatak sampurn. Dor varsha hiach katha asta, CBSE, ICSE ani State Boards-amni nirmiti kel'li. Hea varsachea mukhel kalaakaramamni tornno Rohan S.-cho samavesh asa, zannen nid, samajik jinn ani sambhavitapannen tachi shanti-ui Class 10-chea parikshananim 98.7% ghevn keli. To ata APJ Abdul Kalam mhonn vollkhotat. Thoddeach vellar, dhaktuli Meenak, mhonnchea mhonn, ek *soikarik* 62% ghevn aili, zachem parinam ek kutumbik bandobast ani ticho phone vaprunk jivan bhar bandi. Ah, Bharoti shikshannachim sukh!
normalised: vorsachim vorom follancher aileat, ixttanno! ani mhaka tumkam sangonk dit, ho nattyosomy ek bollyvudd blockbustarak dhoron aasa, rodopi payam, huskar topache ani to ek bhurgo zho fuddlea vorsak toriyaarik aasa. tem ekuch likhnni dor vorsak, dor-garzachi C-B-S-E, I-C-S-E, ani rajdachi manddali bhovtan choloita. hea vorosachi nattvanchi xresttataam yuva rohan S., zannem zop, samajik jinn ani sadhya zollkoddponn xetkarlem, apli dasvi porixent tepsheri atth point sat ttomke mellonk. taka atam podvi mellta aasa fudlo A-P-J obdul kolam mhunn. tech porim, lhan meenak ek, mhunncheam, susegachi sat-osturi ttomke mellile, zachem porinnam ghara bond ani aaykhon varponnponnan vapronk poddonam mhunn ailem. oh, bharatacho xikxonacho anond!

unnormalised: Atam, kitem percent-anchi baat kortanv. Dor boards-amni hea varsachea samanya saraasari acharyancho 78.5% asa. Kiteak mhonn tum vichaarshi? Va, atam sab lok ratto raat Einstein zale va tumchim marking scheme mhoje aji sarkem dhil aa, zannen te mittai dita. Mhojea dhoka thoddesha zaam, khass korun mhojo cousin, zannen ganitachea eka ankant consistently mark melta, torui tannem respectable 60% ghevn ailea. Adhunik shikshannacho chamatkar, hanv tumka sangta! Ani kiteak sab lok 90% bhair English ani Hindint ghetat. Assa mhonn sab Shakespeare va Premchand ratto raat zale.
normalised: atam, ttomkeancher uloiya. hea vorosacho sobhopakximo vost dor manddak sotta-attem ttomke ponch ttomke asta. tum sodtale te kashem? borabor lok einstein raatratuch zala vo ttomkeachem vachponn mhajea ajevollachem tonddol asunk zata. mhaji bet dusrear asta, zannun mhajea bhavan, tannem mathant sodanchem ek ttomke melole, koxen tori sat ttomke kaddlem. adhunik xikxonacho chamatkar, tumka sangtam! ani kitem hea vatechea lokachem ingles ani hindi bhaxen tepsheri ttomke mellunk. kashem lok shakespeare vo premchand raatratuch zale mhunn.

unnormalised: Punn torui college-amni aa. Delhi University-chea cutoff marks-amni aakashachik sparsh kartat mhonn eksaasa – lagbhag 105%. Aita, tum tem borobr vachaat. Kiteak mhonn samanya 100% ghevn impressive nahi. Tumka atam kalatra kartan ani tumchea fuddarchea svatahni exam *poile* diunk persuade kartan. Assa mhonn Mumbai-che local trainant peak hour-ant basun vata – ek aavashak mukti zaamni knitting circle-anim odhik kopaamni asa.
normalised: magir asat kollez. dilleche xexnnakhatir chedanchem mool aakashak sparx kartolem, zannum ekxem ttomke ponch ttomke asunk zata. tum sangtat te barabor asta. kashem tumka ekxem ttomke mellun favo na. tumka atam tumchea bhaviskacha velak cholunk ani tumche tepsheri bhaxent mellunk kitem tum porixa dinakuch vordea. kashem tum munbaichea thanakhatir thanak velar jagekar mhunn bhonvchem asa, ek vevosthitelanchichem jagekarancheam voilem.

unnormalised: Colleges-amchi baat keliar, IIT JEE parinamamni-ui taranga kartat. Eka hushar vicharvantaan 360-amni 359 mark ghevn aileat! Assa mhonn kharok? Thodde mark dusreak di, mhojea ixtta! Ek bhojan utsav asa zannen dor point ani decimal kharach asta, tumchem Computer Science IIT Bombay va Civil Engineering Bihar-chea eka akshay college-ant kitem zata mhonn nirnay korta. Civil engineers-ank koslich apatti na, kharach. Tumka konn tankam bandonk zai, zanchen varshant pavsa kallant swimming pools mhonn zata.
normalised: kollezacher uloytanaa, I-I-T J-E-E follancher tori tofonnastaat. konne ek buddhimont monnisen tinxem ponch panam mellaylem tinxem vosti mellunk. kashem sach? thoriyanch ttomke utrounk dit, tuvem mhojea sangatam! to khori udharnn asta zho dor ttomke ani poddhonachem mool kortaa, zho tujhi kompyutter saynson I-I-T bunbaynt vo silvilly enjiniaring konne ek dukanant biharak mellunk karta. silvilly enjinniarank kashtta mellonk favo na. ami konnacheak ghara bhonkunk zho dar monsoonnche vellak bhammneant bhonktaat tenna zavta mhunn zata.

unnormalised: Punn samanya stress ani hysteria-amni, hanv mothyak dekhonk visrunak mhonn. Eka kagazant ankank tumchea insani mulya mhonn vakti naa. Tumchea 99% va 33% meltear, tumka yaaddoonk mahatvachi zaam, jinn ek marathon asa, ek sprint na. Thoddi vela mhonn Bangalore-chea traafic-ant ek auto-rickshaw chaltat mhonn aa – sambandh dhakkat, aanpekshit ani prayah maharg – punn tumka asa.
normalised: punn sobhem stress ani bhoy, ami mottaa chitracher tori bhonvunk dit. konnachiye monxa mullicheak ek number vachun sangtan zavchina. tum kitem tepsheri nokri vo thont-testuri nokri mellavle, ti vordea tum jemnachi dhoddavnn asta, ek dhoudd zavchina. kherit poddlo, ti bengalorachea ghara khori asta, thoddich nakhddi ani kherit molladik, punn tum jannam zavchean.

unnormalised: Tor, sab vidhyarthy-ank bhair: Ek varsachea parikshamni jivun ailea mhonn abhinandan! Ata momos-amchea plate-chea sangatak utsav korun, tumchea favorite show-ak binge-watch korun, va sambhavitapannen, fuddlea varsachea khatir tayari korun zatat. Sab meltear, natak samapti nahi, ani ek exam ruth asta. Ani sab painkank: Chill pill ghevn, thodde utsahan korun, va ek va don dina khatir phone lupov. Tumchea bhurgeank tumka dhanyavad mellta mhonn sangshat. Antaran.
normalised: sov, sogle bhurgea bhair asa: tumcher kuttomban dusrea vorosachi porixent jiit vellea! atam tum momochea pattik bhonvun, aplem favtea nattyem pollounk, ani kashenn fudlea vorosak tepsheri mellonk aaylam mhunn. kherit poddlo, dhonddhacho vel sonvchnam ani dor porixentchi rito dusrea mhollean ailyach karta. ani soglle payank: ek xithal golli ghet, kherit dillo, ani don vo thin disamkhatir aaykhon lupunk dit. tumchim bhurgen tumcho utkar zata mhunn zannata. fuddarak.

unnormalised: Ani yaad dovrunk, meltear sab dukhi ashta, tumka samanya ek YouTube channel suru kartan. Konn degree-ak zai va tum virel dance video-chea ek raat sensations mhonn zata? Just kidding… ekdam. Punn hey, hea zamanaan sab sambhavit asta. Tumka 100% ghevn aale lokank vichaarshi... tanka kitem mahiti aasa!
normalised: ani tumchem manachem kashtta zait, tumchem svotachem youtyub zattik vhoddunk ek favo asta. konnek podvicho kherit koshem tum ek raatratuch virul nattyem vachonk zanvta? kherit poddlo... soobachem. punn heo dinank, kitem tori favo zavchem. konnachem tanchea sangatam, zannenche ekxem nokri inglesachem assaa, kitem tori teo jannam zavta zavchean!
